<?php

# Generated by formgen.py - %fg_time%

%fg_field_definitions%

print_message($this->session->flashdata('message'),$this->session->flashdata('message_type'));   

if( isset($a['id']) )
	echo "<div class='dt-heading'>Edit %fg_nice_name%</div>"; 
else
	echo "<div class='dt-heading'>New %fg_nice_name%</div>"; 

echo form_open($this->uri->uri_string()); 
?>

<table>
	%fg_fields%

	<?php if( isset( $a['id'] ) ) { ?>
	<tr>
                <td></td>
		<td><br />
			<input type="submit" name="submit" class="button" value="Save Changes" /><div style="display:inline; position: relative; bottom:3px; margin-left:20px;"><a href="<?php echo site_url('%fg_table_name%') ?>">Cancel</a></div></td>
                <td></td>
		
        </tr>
	<?php } else { ?>
	<tr>
                <td></td>
		<td><br />
			<input type="submit" name="submit" class="button" value="Save %fg_nice_name%" /><div style="display:inline; position: relative; bottom:3px; margin-left:20px;"><a href="<?php echo site_url('%fg_table_name%') ?>">Cancel</a></td>
                <td></td>
        </tr>
	<?php } ?>


</table>
<?php echo form_close(); ?>
